title: reactive-messaging-kafka + config-yaml - warning about unknown '"auto.offset.reset"' config
body:
### Describe the bug

reactive-messaging-kafka + config-yaml - warning about unknown '"auto.offset.reset"' config

```
2022-02-02 21:08:44,247 INFO  [io.sma.rea.mes.kafka] (Quarkus Main Thread) SRMSG18214: Key deserializer omitted, using String as default
2022-02-02 21:08:44,343 WARN  [org.apa.kaf.cli.con.ConsumerConfig] (Quarkus Main Thread) The configuration '"auto.offset.reset"' was supplied but isn't a known config.
2022-02-02 21:08:44,407 INFO  [io.sma.rea.mes.kafka] (Quarkus Main Thread) SRMSG18258: Kafka producer kafka-producer-words-out, connected to Kafka brokers 'OUTSIDE://localhost:55004', is configured to write records to 'words'
2022
...
```

Generated `src/main/resources/application.yml` looks like this:
```yaml
greeting:
  message: "hello"
mp:
  messaging:
    outgoing:
      words-out:
        topic: "words"
    incoming:
      words-in:
        topic: "words"
        auto.offset.reset: "earliest"
```

But should look like this:
```yaml
greeting:
  message: "hello"
mp:
  messaging:
    outgoing:
      words-out:
        topic: "words"
    incoming:
      words-in:
        topic: "words"
        auto:
          offset:
            reset: "earliest"
```

### Expected behavior

No warning

### Actual behavior

Warning about unknown config entry

### How to Reproduce?

 - Download app https://code.quarkus.io/?e=smallrye-reactive-messaging-kafka&e=config-yaml
 - Run `mvn quarkus:dev`
 - check log

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

Java 17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.7.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
